description:
Stay on top of all things off-road. These rugged trail running shoes invite you to explore farther and faster. With light and cushioned construction, they're designed for tackling tough terrain through long or short runs. The trail specific outsole features aggressive lugs that dig into wet or dry surfaces like it's no big deal. The bonded waterproof-breathable membrane is lighter than previous versions so you can comfortably tackle trails though the wet months.

  • Breathable mesh upper gives a smooth sock-like fit
  • GORE-TEX® Invisible Fit waterproof-breathable membrane is bonded directly to the upper
  • Trail Adapt System combines proprietary DNA LOFT v2 cushioning, a protective rock plate, and strategically placed outsole pods for all-terrain comfort and stability
  • Lace guards secure your laces out of the way
  • Gaiter loop for secure gaiter attachment
  • Lightweight DNA LOFT v2 midsole is thicker and softer than the previous version for added comfort
  • Ballistic Rock Shield protects from punctures and trail bumps
  • TrailTack® rubber outsole is extra grippy on both wet and dry surfaces
name: Brooks Cascadia 17 Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
